data.name: Galactic Junk League - Cyber Launch Pack
data.detailed_description:
The Cyber Launch Pack includes:

  • DLC exclusive Cyberpunk ships Corsair, Striker, Visitor, Polaris
  • complete Cyberpunk building block set
  • 30x Space Whisky to boost match rewards for you and the whole team
  • 30 days of Galactic Pilot License, which doubles your Junk and Class XP rewards
  • 1500 Space Credits, which can be used to purchase other premium items

Content of the Cyber Launch Pack will be added to your game once you log in to Galactic Junk League. Every DLC pack can only be purchased once for one Steam account.

data.short_description: Cyber Launch Pack DLC for Galactic Junk League with 4 exclusive Cyberpunk ships, complete Cyberpunk building block set and 30 Space Whisky and 30 days of Pilot License to double your XP rewards
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Czech, Hungarian, Polish, Portuguese, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Japanese, Romanian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1
  • Processor: Intel Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 3000
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 650 and better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.6
  • Processor: Intel Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OSX 10.6 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB or higher
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
